GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles. Articles can be sorted by any property, ordered in ascending or descending order and filtered by topic.

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object with information about specified article

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increases or decreases the votes for an article by the number of votes specified in patch query and returns the updated article.

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET api/users.description: Serves an array of all users.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments for the specified article.

POST: /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the list associated with the specified article and returns the newly added comment.

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment from the database
